description: Class
Subclass
Order
Family
Genus
Species
Reference number - This is my maintenance code for updates.
New Reference number - These are the refs numbers in the files REFS and SUMMARY.
Family Label -  An 8-character label for family.
Genus Label -   An 8-character label for genus.
Species Label - An 8-character label for species.
Species code -  A 5-character code for the species.
Disperser type category - BIRDS, MIXED, MAMMALS.
Disperser type - Finer categorization. Not yet completed. Needs revision.

Geographic area - Major geographic areas of the data sources. MEurope: Mediterranean Europe (also includes Israel and Morocco. NEurope: Temperate and Northern Europe. NAmerica: North America, excl. Southern Mexico. NTAmerica: Neotropical America, incl. Southern Mexico. Africa: Africa, south of Sahara. Australasia: Australia, Malaysia, New Guinea, and whole SouthEast Asia.
Fruit type - Type of fruit. Not completed yet.

Individual seed mass
Relative yield of pulp: dry mass of pulp/whole fruit fresh mass
Specific energy content of pulp (kJ/g)
Total energy content per fruit (kJ)
Percent water of the fruit
Proportion of lipids (per g dry pulp)
Proportion of protein (per g dry pulp)
Proportion of non-structural carbohydrates (per g dry pulp)
Proportion of ash (per g dry pulp)
Proportion of fiber (per g dry pulp)
